```{r}
lifeexpec <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\pajos\\rstudio-workspace\\Life Expectancy Data.csv") 


colnames(lifeexpec)
unique(lifeexpec$Status)
lifeexpec$Status <- factor(x=lifeexpec$Status, levels=unique(lifeexpec$Status), labels=c(0,1))
lifeexpec <- within(lifeexpec, rm(Country))
lifeexpec

lifeexpec$Life.expectancy[is.na(lifeexpec$Life.expectancy)] <- mean(lifeexpec$Life.expectancy, na.rm = T)
lifeexpec$Polio[is.na(lifeexpec$Polio)] <- mean(lifeexpec$Polio, na.rm = T)
lifeexpec$BMI[is.na(lifeexpec$BMI)] <- mean(lifeexpec$BMI, na.rm = T)
lifeexpec$Diphtheria[is.na(lifeexpec$Diphtheria)] <- mean(lifeexpec$Diphtheria, na.rm = T)
lifeexpec$Year[is.na(lifeexpec$Year)] <- mean(lifeexpec$Year, na.rm = T)
lifeexpec$percentage.expenditure[is.na(lifeexpec$percentage.expenditure)] <- mean(lifeexpec$percentage.expenditure, na.rm = T)
lifeexpec$HIV.AIDS[is.na(lifeexpec$HIV.AIDS)] <- mean(lifeexpec$HIV.AIDS, na.rm = T)
lifeexpec$Status[is.na(lifeexpec$Status)] <- mean(lifeexpec$Status, na.rm = T)



fit <- lm(lifeexpec$Life.expectancy~lifeexpec$Status+lifeexpec$percentage.expenditure+lifeexpec$BMI+lifeexpec$Polio+lifeexpec$Diphtheria+lifeexpec$HIV.AIDS)
summary(fit)

library(car)
library(MASS)
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
qqPlot(fit)

library(car)
par(mfrow=c(1,1))
residualPlot(fit, type="rstudent", quadratic=F, col = "dodgerblue",
             pch=16, cex=1.5, cex.axis=1.5, cex.lab=1.5)

```
